\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	B \&\& E \&\& X \\
	B \&\& {B_C} \&\& {B_B} \\
	\&\& {\mathbf{Inj}}
	\arrow[hook, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["i"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "s"', dashed, from=1-5, to=2-3]
	\arrow["j", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\in }"{marking, allow upside down}, draw=none, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\circlearrowright"{marking, allow upside down}, draw=none, from=0, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
